settings.title: Great Coffee
settings.body: The coffee in our pods is certified organic by the Soil Association and ethically sourced from sustainable farms around the world.

settings.title: Doing Good
settings.body: Compostable pods, totally free from nasty plastics. We deliver every order carbon-positive - that's 40,000 trees protected, and counting!

settings.title: Subscribe & Save
settings.body: Get a free Grind tin and free delivery when you subscribe. Skip, pause or cancel your subscription anytime, with no fuss.

settings.title: House Blend
settings.body: Our signature Grind House Blend cuts through milk with notes of chocolate and hazelnut.

settings.title: Light Blend
settings.body: A lighter, more floral blend, served in our espressos and long blacks.

settings.title: Dark Blend
settings.body: An old-school dark roast, packing a real punch.

settings.title: Decaf Blend
settings.body: The same kick as the House Blend, without the caffeine.

settings.title: A small change, a big difference.
settings.body: 29,000 plastic and aluminium pods go to landfilll every minute. When composted, Grind coffee pods break down in weeks - but even in landfill they'll break down hundreds of times faster than their plastic or aluminium cousins.

settings.tags: Trustpilot

settings.quote: "Of all the machines I tested, this was the most satisfying to use."
Sustainability isnâ€™t something we often associate with pod coffee machines, but the Grind One pod coffee machine is designed with just this in mind.
